original_text: Then they went along through the wilderness, and compassed the land of Edom, and the land of Moab, and came by the east side of the land of Moab, and pitched on the other side of Arnon, but came not within the border of Moab: for Arnon was the border of Moab.
korean_text: 그 후에 광야를 지나 에돔 땅과 모압 땅을 돌아서 모압 땅의 해 뜨는 쪽으로 들어가 아르논 저쪽에 진 쳤고 아르논은 모압의 경계이므로 모압 지역 안에는 들어가지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Then they went along through the wilderness
and compassed the land of Edom
and came by the east side of the land of Moab
and pitched on the other side of Arnon
but came not within the border of Moab
for Arnon was the border of Moab
